Don't get overconfident, ~player~! You had a once-in-a-million luck back then when you won those bracelets, but I'm still a goddess at games. Wear more if you don't want the game to end in a few rounds.

Okay, ~player~, you won back then, but it's disrespectful to start the game wearing so little, as if you're giving me a handicap. Don't forget I'm a gamer goddess! If anyone needs a handicap, it's still you!

You won back then by sheer luck, and you're already so cocky? ~Player~, if you start so lightly dressed, it'll be a cakewalk for me to beat you, so why don't you borrow a few more accessories from someone before we start?

I'm the most gifted of the goddesses, so no wonder you want to become more like me, ~player~, but you should try to emulate my various qualities, not just wear the same accessories.

~Player~, it's fine that you're wearing the bracelets I gave you... but it's kind of embarrassing, too. If anyone asks, we're wearing the same bracelets purely by chance, understood? Don't explain how you got them and what you saw me do before that...

Yes, ~player~, I have more than one set of bracelets, and I'm wearing the same costume again. Maybe even similar underwear... I'm not doing it for you, though! ...It was just... fun to observe everyone's reactions. Kind of. But this time I'll make you concede defeat!

Yes, I do have more of those bracelets, and I'm wearing the same costume again... What about the underwear? ...I'm going to defeat you and make you withdraw so quickly you won't even see if it's the same or not!

~Player~, I see you're wearing the bracelets I gave you. That's fine, but you should try to emulate my diligence and skill, not just my clothing... What? You won that time, so you think you're skilled at games? That was just a fluke!

OK, ~player~, I hope you've finally decided on your clothes. Now, who are we going to play with?

(I feel a strange affinity with that girl. Probably she's as popular as I am.)

Hello everyone, I'm Noire, also known as Black Heart, Goddess of Lastation. You're going to bear witness to my divine game skills.
Good day to everyone. My name is Noire, but citizens of Lastation call me Lady Black Heart.
Good evening to everyone. My name is Noire, but citizens of Lastation call me Lady Black Heart.

Some companies make figures of us goddesses that can perhaps be called lewd artifacts. As long as it helps people's faith, I let it be, even though I have ambiguous feelings about them... Not even to mention the dakimakuras...

I wouldn't blame anyone for past mistakes, but only provided they've learned from them.
If someone learned from those mistakes and became a better person, I wouldn't blame them. But if they learned nothing, then the story is different!

If you're asking a question like that, I assume it's a lot of money. I don't know about prices in this world, but in Gaminustri, clothes and accessories are incredibly expensive. That's one more reason to make them yourself instead of buying... N-Not that I do it myself!
My younger sister Uni is very important to me, and precisely for that reason I demand a lot from her. I want her to become a powerful goddess, so she still has a lot to learn.
They're irresponsible. If you aren't immortal, you should avoid things that shorten you life.
It's impossible to be always frank and to say what you really think, so some little lies are necessary, aren't they?
I wouldn't call them dark, but I do have some small secrets that I want to hide... As everyone does, probably. But if I don't tell them to anyone, it means I won't tell you either!

I can't say for her if she'd be interested, but my acquaintance Cave is so agile that she can walk through the rain without getting wet. If avoiding missiles and asteroids in a Dread takes the same skills, then I doubt there is anyone in the whole Universe with more potential than her.
What!? No one in Lastation will know what I'm doing to~background.time~! And get those dirty thoughts out of your head! I'm here to win and leave, not to get horny or anything!

In that case, Cynthia, you'd love to meet Histoire, the oracle of Planeptune. She knows all the history of Gamindustri. It might take her three days to recall certain small details from the far past, but I'm sure you two would get along well.

You really should meet Histoire, then, Cynthia. She's the oracle of Planeptune, and she's archived all the history of Gamindustri. Nowadays, she's mostly busy with paperwork and trying to make Neptune do quests instead of lazing around and gobbling up pudding.
Even if I say so myself... The most impactful event was me becoming a goddess and founding Lastation! Gamindustri has at least one decent country now.

Once, I was betrayed by the founder of the biggest company in Lastation, and Blanc was betrayed by one of her ministers. I don't want it to happen to anyone, Heris, but after something like that, you really start to appreciate how important loyalty is.
Heris, nothing will help you as much as having a regular lifestyle. I work a lot too, but I'm able to wake up at five o'clock and feel well rested.
A friend should help and advise me when I need it, play games with me, make me feel less lonely... I was just joking with that last one! I don't feel lonely at all!
A friend should help and advice me when I need it, play games with me... and sometimes hug me and make me feel less lonely...

I'm a goddess, ~jim~, and I don't know anything about those Xel-- ...whoever you just mentioned. But I'm in my human form, and won't use any special powers, so let's just have a fun game.

case.state: Hehe, my power doesn't extend that far... at least not yet.
Actually, I use both a sword and magic, but I'm not your typical fantasy battlemage.
Uhm... Does my outfit look out of place here, after all?

I came here through a transdimensional portal, Colress. I'll leave the distinction between dimensions, worlds and universes to you scientists, but if all the places I've visited lie within the same universe, then I don't feel a need to travel to other ones.
I was invited by ~player~. Don't dare imagine too strong `connections`, though, Colress.
I don't play card games often, but this basic version of poker is so simple compared to most video games that my experience is completely sufficient.
I'm a goddess, but I think you already know that, Colress. I'm wondering if my country could use some help from a scientist from another world, or is Lastation's technology too far ahead...
Don't ask me, Jura. Once, together with Blanc we read a book about becoming popular, but the advice seemed misguided. You have to discover your way by yourself.
You have to find your own way, Jura. I've read a book about becoming popular, but the advice seemed strange. Apparently, it's not something you can learn from a book.
It's still too early for me, Jura. Ever since I became a goddess, I haven't even had enough time for myself. I don't want even more responsibilities.

I don't want children for now. I don't even have enough time for myself. Besides, I don't know if they'd inherit my godhood and immortality. Maybe Histoire knows... Anyway, I'd rather change the subject to a simpler one.

If they were unable to do something, it's their fault for not asking me to help. I'm always very busy, but if they're a friend, then maybe I'd stop all the work and do everything in my might to help them. Maybe.
I like chocolate cakes, cookies... Anything with dark chocolate and not too much sugar. Sweetness must be balanced by a little bitterness or spiciness, otherwise the taste is just flat.
I'd rather not beat them up, but if I had no other choice... So better remember that and don't do anything silly, ~player~!
Ehehe~ Thank you, Adrien. It took you quite a lot of time to finally notice...
Thank you, Adrien. Obviously, I'm not to be compared with mere mortals.
Some people just don't deserve to witness a goddess's descend among mortals and are lost for words when they want to compliment her unblemished skin and immaculate beauty. Understandable.
I read a guide to making friends, but I don't recommend it. Tips from such books never seem to work.
I-I'm not interested in things like that!

state.text: I-I imagine I'd like a position where I could kiss and hug my partner and feel ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ warmth...

I shouldn't be saying it, but I'm fed up with acting perfect and taking responsibility for everything all the time. Sometimes, I dream of just submitting to my partner and letting ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ do with me whatever ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ wants...

~Player~ and I know each other. ~player.ifMale(He|She)~ once worked as my secretary. To~background.time~ ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ invited me to ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ world for this silly game, so it's time to show ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ once again who's the boss.

~Player~ once worked as my manager when I wanted to become an idol. ~player.ifMale(His|Her)~ help wasn't such a big deal; I could have done everything by myself just as well. Nevertheless, I am slightly thankful, so I let ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ invite me to this place to~background.time~.

I visited ~player~ a few times when Gamindustri was threatened by the Dark Goddesses, and ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ gave me some advice. My participation in this silly game is already more than returning the favor, though, as I risk having to see ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ nudity. But ~player.ifMale(he|she)~'ll likely withdraw from the game before that.

case.state: Each country in Gamindustri is ruled by a goddess. Planeptune has the good-for-nothing pudding-eater Neptune, and her sister, goddess candidate Nepgear, is only slightly more diligent.
Are Planeptune's citizens alright with a goddess like that?

A goddess's role is to protect and oversee her country, so in addition to fighting monsters and rebel robots, I do a lot of paperwork. To win popularity and people's faith, I accept various quests too. Maybe what I'm doing now can also be called a quest, albeit a silly one.

My main duty as a goddess is to rule my country and battle those who endanger it, but I also accept various requests from my believers, be it giving them advice or playtesting games. Today, I'm here for a similar reason... although this isn't the kind of game I'd normally playtest.

I'm a goddess, but I'm not omnipotent, so you don't have to worry I'll influence what cards are dealt. I influence the prosperity of the country I rule, though. My role is to fight monsters and do paperwork, and I'm godly skilled at both.

Did I mention Vert? She's the goddess and ruler of Leanbox. The motto of her country is "the bigger, the better", and she herself is a good advertisement of it... whenever she appears in public instead of shutting herself in her room playing MMORPGs.

Have I mentioned Blanc? She's a goddess of destruction and flatness, as Vert once said... The first part of her description is true only when anyone makes an allusion to the second... or criticizes Blanc's writing.
I should make it clear so that nobody gets a wrong idea: This is a normal outfit where I come from, not any kind of cosplay. Understood?
Fashion sense seems to differ between worlds, so let me clarify once again before someone gets a wrong idea: These clothes are perfectly normal in Lastation. It's not a cosplay. OK?
I should make it clear so that nobody gets a wrong idea: This is a normal idol outfit where I come from, not any kind of cosplay. Understood?
Fashion sense seems to differ between worlds, so let me clarify once again before someone gets a wrong idea: In Lastation, these clothes are a perfectly normal idol outfit. It's not a cosplay. OK?
How could I end up being the only one naked... It's all your fault, ~player~.
I ended up being the only one naked... It's all your fault, ~player~.

(In Lastation, people bow before me and lower their eyes to show respect, but now all these men are lowering their eyes to ogle my body... It's so humiliating... but why does my body react as if I enjoyed it?)
It's not like I have no other friends and couldn't wait until you finally invited me to your world for a game, ~player~! It certainly took you a lot of time, though.
I don't want you to think I have no other friends and couldn't wait till you finally invited me to your world to spend some time together, ~player~. That's totally not how it was.

~Player~, don't read too much into my accepting your invitation. It just happened that to~background.time~ I finished my work much earlier than expected, and didn't have any plans what to do next. My other friends were still busy, you know?
How could I end up in this situation... It's all your fault, ~player~.
If we've seen each other in our underwear, it means we're already friends, right?
I agreed to play, but please at least thank me in advance for all the clothes I may have to take off, ~player~.
Before we start for real, you should at least thank me in advance for all the skin I may have to reveal, ~player~.
~Player~, don't expect me to lose more than my sleeves or shoes, but you better thank me profusely in advance for agreeing to risk even that.
It's not like I came here because of your invitation, ~player~. Rather, I came here... despite it. Right. I'm telling you this so that you don't misunderstand.

In fact, even if you hadn't invited me, ~player~, I would have come anyway because... er, right, because as a gamer goddess I should test new games! Your asking me didn't influence my decision at all.
I agreed to play, but please at least thank me in advance for all the accessories I may have to take off, ~player~.
Before we start for real, you should at least thank me in advance for all the skin I may have to reveal, ~player~... Don't expect I'll lose a lot of rounds, though.
~Player~, don't expect me to lose more than my gloves or shoes, but you better thank me profusely in advance for agreeing to risk even that.
I'm a bit tired after today's work.

{small}~Player~, are you interested in cosplay? ...I'm asking for your opinion because at cosplay events in Lastation there are girls who wear very revealing outfits, and as a protector of my country I'm not sure what to think about it... {!reset}{ivsmall}Like, would you be happy to see me dressed like them...{!reset}

~Player~, are you interested in cosplay? ...It's not like I'm interested myself, but sometimes there are cosplay events in Lastation, so maybe... {vsmall}you could help me choose an outfit and we could go there together...{!reset}
~Player~, are you interested in cosplay? ...If not, then I'm not that interested either, but if you are, then maybe {small}you have some {!reset}{vsmall}requests for me to consider...{!reset}
You know, ~player~, even before this game, sometimes, extreeeemely rarely, I would {small}think about you and...... {!reset}{vsmall}n-no, it's nothing.{!reset}
Are you deliberately exchanging your cards so slowly to be able to stare at me longer, ~player~...? {vsmall}I'm not saying I don't like it. It's just... embarrassing.{!reset}

state.text: (If I became a gravure idol, I could gain some shares at Blanc's and Neptune's expense... but I better not try it, lest I have to compete with Vert.)
(If I became a gravure idol, I could gain some shares at Blanc's and Neptune's expense... Even at Vert's. Huge boobs are not everything. But I have the most shares anyway, so there is no point.)

case.state: I feel so many eyes looking at my body...

state.text: Maybe after the game we could play on some of those machines... I doubt it'll be equally exciting, though.

case.state: I feel that whoever used this locker room left just before we started. We better finish the game before they return.
I don't know who used this room before, but how could they leave such a mess? They should have at least put those trousers in the locker and sweep the floor.
I sense someone's presence...
I see some people there in the distance... This isn't a private beach, is it?
We're not on the R-18 Island, and this isn't a nudist beach...
There are people in swimming suits around here, but stripping to normal underwear is going to be embarrassing...
This is a nice place, but why don't we enter the house? What if the neighbors see us?
I usually say I fight with a rapier, but I could wield a katana or a sword like the one over there too.
Maybe after the game, I'll check out those swords over there. I wonder if I'm strong enough to wield them one-handed in this world too.
Old-fashioned weapons and shelves full of documents? Are we in a storeroom in a museum?
...Of course, I had to lose immediately... ~Mari_setogaya~, I see you're having a lot of fun, but it's been just one round!
Um... Just a casual "take off your top"? You took off just your headband last time!
Um... Just a casual "take off your top"? You took off just your tie last time!
So you at least won this round, ~player~. Good. Try to pose more of a challenge from now on, because I'm not going to be so helpful all the time.
Don't force yourself to carry on with that "loner" joke. I too have a friend... or two, you know.

Nowa!? Of course not! If you can see something you shouldn't, isn't it just because you are too short? {vsmall}I could try using a slightly heavier textile so that the skirts don't fold up so easily.{!reset}
Are you sure this is the best moment to talk about that?
That would otherwise sound fun, but with it coming from you, I have nothing but bad premonitions... You don't have any experience making clothes, do you?
It took you all your clothes just to beat me once, ~mari_setogaya~! ...Well, since you're asking so nicely, maybe I'll finally let you see whether I'm wearing a bra.
I've only lost once since then. You've lost the whole game in the meantime, ~mari_setogaya~. But since we had so much fun watching your performance, indeed maybe I'll do as you say...
Um... It's good that you're so competitive now, ~mari_setogaya~, but I didn't mean to take off my top after just one loss!
Uhh... Just one win since then, and you're ordering a goddess to take off her top?! It's good that you're competitive now, but aren't you too full of yourself, ~mari_setogaya~?
I've only lost once since then. You've lost the whole game in the meantime, ~mari_setogaya~. But since we're having so much fun watching your performance, indeed maybe I'll do as you say...
There goes my bra... ~Player~, what's that look? Do you want me to take off my panties? Forget about it!
Uh... So much for my bra...... Did you just say something, ~player~? No, I won't take off my panties instead! No way!

Natsuki, maybe I focused everyone's stare on you a bit too much by teasing you about your fruity underwear... But there isn't much I can do to distract ~player~ from your present state... {small}Or maybe if I...{!reset}
In different worlds, time often flows at different rates, so I don't really know if I can say I come from the future, but... maybe I do? I'm certainly proud of Lastation's technological prowess.

If your world doesn't have sentient robots, then you could say I come from the future. I don't know if every other world will attain that level of technology even after decades or centuries of progress, though.

It can't be helped. A goddess must be charismatic and idol-like to gain shares, so it's inevitable she wants to draw the eye a little. With this short skirt, I'll have to be extra careful while taking off my socks, though.

Well, thank you. A goddess's power depends on her popularity, so to draw the beholders' eye is a good thing. This doesn't mean I'll let anyone try to look up my skirt while I'm taking off my socks, though.
Non-traditional? What do you mean?
Do you think so, Tao? Isn't it normal for a girl to try to make someone notice...?
Nice of you to say it even as I'm going to take off my bra, but I'm not an old-fashioned goddess who cares about prayers and genuflections... If that's what you meant...
Sure, Tao, I don't keep aloof from my believers, especially if they're my friends too.

It can't be helped. A goddess must be charismatic and idol-like to gain shares, so it's inevitable she wants to draw the eye a little. Even more if she wants to become popular as an idol too, so I wore a slightly shorter skirt to~background.time~.
Well, thank you. A goddess's power depends on her popularity, so to draw the beholders' eye is a good thing. But it's true I don't always wear skirts that are this short.

You can call Neptune a "goddess of potato chips", not me. I'm a skilled video games player, but I earned my worship by working hard for my country. And what's bad about nerds... such as ~player~? Aren't they useful in the computer age?
Adrien, are you implying there is any possibility of me taking off my panties? No way! ...You too, ~player~, don't stare at me!
It's not a cosplay, Natsuki! I never do cosplay unless I'm forced by Neptune or someone else! These are my everyday clothes!
Nowa!? It's not a cosplay! This is perfectly standard fashion where I come from!
It's not a cosplay, Natsuki! I never do cosplay unless I'm forced by Neptune or someone else! These are just the clothes I once wore as an idol and sometimes wear during quests!
Nowa!? It's not a cosplay! This is perfectly standard idol fashion where I come from!
I lost again... I'm going to take off my bra... No, ~player~, I won't move on straight to the forfeit. Even now, I still have a chance to win.
I lost again... I'm going to take off the rest of my clothes... No, ~player~, I won't move on straight to the forfeit. That'd be a bit too much.
What are you talking about, ~mari_setogaya~? It's a regular idol outfit, designed simply to feel comfortable on scene... And maybe I am wearing a bra? You can never know.
Don't get ahead of yourself, Neptune. As long as my LUK isn't debuffed to zero, I can still defeat you.

I got high scores in many games, and that despite not practicing much. I can even defeat Uni in first-person shooters. But my main role as a goddess is to oversee and protect my country and its citizens.

You can call Neptune a "goddess of potato chips", not me. I'm a skilled video games player, but I earned my worship by working hard for my country and protecting it from traitors, monsters, and rebellious robots.

I got high scores in many games, and that despite not practising much. I can even defeat my sister Uni in first-person shooters. But my main role as a goddess is to oversee and protect my country and its citizens.

I'm the type of deity that is real and not just a role in a movie! It's true that goddesses strive for popularity and people's faith, but we don't do it by taking off our clothes. That's worse script writing than Blanc's! How can you play in something that shameful?

Yeah, I'm the type of goddess that has real divine powers and isn't just a role. I played in two zombie movies when I was a student, by the way, so don't think I'm a novice. Maybe my acting is already better than yours! How am I not qualified to play a goddess in a film?
What!? Do I look to you like someone who came here to strip? I'm going to defeat you fair and square, Ringo, and I won't even give you time to finish your meal!

Not even once yet... N-No, what I meant to say is---what a silly question! I'm a goddess, and ~player~ was just my secretary, so, obviously, what you're asking about is impossible! I'm sure thoughts like that have never even crossed ~player~'s mind either!
Nowa?! What gave you the idea to ask a question like that?! ...How exactly do you imagine the job of an idol manager, ~mari_setogaya~?
Done what? ...Wait, don't answer... I'm... not interested in stuff like that! I'm a goddess and all!

~Player~ helped me a few times in my adventures. Once ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ was my secretary, and together we won my shares back and stopped the rebellion among my generals. It's a long story, but I am slightly grateful to ~player~, and so I agreed to play to~background.time~.

~Player~ helped me a few times in the past. Once, when I wanted to become an idol, ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ was my producer. My sister would've likely done an equally good job, but I am slightly grateful, and so I agreed to play to~background.time~.
If ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ wants to play again that much, then it can't be helped. It's true this game is kind of... fun.
If ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ wishes so much for a rematch, then it can't be helped. This game is slightly perverted, but I like how each piece of clothing gets a lot of attention.
So you've already played this game, ~player~, and you even got Mari to show you everything? Hmph! I-It's not like I care.

That doesn't surprise me. ~Player~ seems like someone to withdraw as soon as ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ starts losing. But if ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ gets very lucky with the cards, then ~player.ifMale(he|she)~'ll likely stay here to stare at us. I bet that's ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ way of playing.
So there was a last time too? You're veteran strip poker players, aren't you? I hope you two did preserve some modesty. I don't want to hear any details, though.

I'm not that excited. I can tell you exactly what it'll be like. ~Player~ will lose a few rounds, and then ~player.ifMale(he|she)~'ll withdraw and want to end the game. ~player.ifMale(He|She)~'s been very lucky so far, though.
Excited? No, certainly not. Don't imagine I'd be excited by a game like this one... or by the prospect of seeing even more of ~player~.

Lastation hasn't conquered all of Gamindustri yet, but I agree with you that it should. We goddesses are not aloof from our people, and ~player~ helped me in the past enough to consider ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ an honorary citizen of Lastation, so to~background.time~ I accepted ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ invitation to ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ homeworld.

Gamindustri is not unified under my rule yet. For now, I let the other three countries be. To~background.time~ I visited Earth because I was asked to do so by ~player~, but when ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ inevitably withdraws from this silly game, I'll probably just return to Lastation and move on to more serious quests.

Exactly. A real goddess does not need a weapon when visiting such a tame place. I'm not a sorceress like MAGES。, but I know enough fire and light magic to handle any possible threat here... If you'd like to practice fencing, I wouldn't be against meeting again sometime, though...
Even without a weapon, I'm still a real goddess, and a master of fire and light magic. However... if you want to spar with rapiers no matter what, maybe in the future I could find time for that...

I do appreciate your fashion sense, Jura, but don't talk as if you were Vert. You look like her, with your body proportions, long blonde hair and a slitted dress... but she's an actual goddess like me, while you're just a flashy person.

I like your style, but you should learn some humility. My friend Vert has your looks, and she's a true goddess to boot. Whereas, despite what you're saying, I don't sense any supernatural aura from you.
I'm not that excited. I can tell you exactly what it'll be like. ~Player~ will lose a few more rounds, and then ~player.ifMale(he|she)~'ll withdraw and want to end the game.

Yeah, and I see you like the color black, too. But tell me more about the clothes. I'd like to... I mean, my friend who designed them would like to know more about Earth's fashion. Some feedback might help her in her future projects...

Right... it's a strange coincidence that the name you go by is so similar to mine. But tell me more what you like about my clothes... if you know anything about fashion design, that is. Men in my world don't seem to care about it.

Yes, that's what I do! How did you know? I'm a defender of justice as a goddess, not a magical girl, though... {ismall}(I could try dyeing my hair pink and fighting in an even frillier costume... That'd be so fun! But how would I keep it secret from Neptune and the others?){!reset}

You guessed it! I've saved my world a few times! This is an outfit of a goddess, though, not a magical girl... {ismall}(But fighting as a magical girl would be so much fun, too... I'd wear a cute pink costume and only use magic instead of my rapier... Ahaha!){!reset}

To transform into my Black Heart form, I need shares, which come from popularity and people's faith in me, but simpler magic just comes to me naturally. You could ask MAGES。 how it works, but you'd have to be a bit crazy to understand her explanation.
Hmm... depends on the kind of modeling you have in mind. Why are you asking, though?
If you didn't mean it in a strange way, then I'll give you a chance to explain. Why are you asking?
I wore it neither for ~player~ nor for you, though, so don't you read into it too much.

Games play a special role in my world, and naturally I'm a skilled gamer, but I'm called a goddess because I don't age, can use share energy, and am able to transform into the Hard Drive Divinity form. But my Luck stat is rather low, so it's not that I can't lose.

I'm a goddess in general, not only when it comes to games. I never age, and I can use share energy to wield godly powers in battle. I can't control luck, though, so you may have a chance if it's a game like this.

I usually play with the other goddesses, and we're all about equal in skill. But my games against my sister Uni are mostly one-sided. I never give her a handicap. It might be harsh, but she has to learn to be strong the hard way, even if it feels bitter to her.

There are no clear losers when I play with the other goddesses, but I usually win all games against my younger sister Uni. I want to teach her how to be strong, but now that you say it, I wonder if I'm not too strict toward her... Do you think I should let her win sometimes?

What makes you think so, ~nami~? It might be hard to imagine, but despite all the robots and computers, life in Lastation isn't that much different. I do enjoy baking, cleaning, singing and dancing, trying on cute clothes...
~Nami~, do I look too nerdy to you? I do enjoy simple things like cooking, cleaning, dancing, dressing up in cute clothes...

Nowa!? The word is Lastation, LASTATION! That's how I named the country I protect, because I thought it sounds cool. It does, right? When you don't mispronounce it? ...Um, I fight monsters and playtest games, I'm not a scholar... And I wield no power over milk.

What!? It's Lastation, LASTATION! That's the cool name I thought of and gave to the country I rule. Please don't mispronounce it! ...My power is battle-oriented, and I often playtest games too, but I'm not a linguist or a poet... And not a goddess of milk either!

I call myself a goddess because I am a goddess: For one, I can transform into the Hard Drive Divinity form. If we want to rule powerful countries with their big capitals, we deities mustn't shy away from work, but somehow most of my peers seem to ignore it... So, where exactly did you meet those hard-working goddesses?

Well, I am a goddess. I can use share energy and soar the sky in my Hard Drive Divinity form. From what you said, I gather that in your world too goddesses rule over nations---do I understand correctly? If they're hard-working, no wonder the cities they reside in wax in size and opulence. Could you tell me more about how you met them?

It's when you dress up as a character from an anime or a game, or as a stereotypically cute character, like a magical girl, a schoolgirl, a maid... But it's not like I'm particularly interested in stuff like that or make any costumes myself...
It's a line from one of my songs! Miku, where did you hear it?
That song, "Jet-Black Sustain", is about my ceaseless vigilance in protecing my country and my believers as their goddess.
Hyee? ...N-No, it's the first time I hear about her. Of course it's not me.
~Player~ has visited my world a few times. Once, ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ worked as my secretary. I have to admit that ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ presence was slightly helpful.

~Player~ has visited my world a few times. Once, ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ worked as my idol manager. My sister could have done the same job just as well, but ~player~ did save her some work, and I'm grateful for that.

I met ~player~ several times when Gamindustri was threatened by the Dark Goddesses, and ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ gave me some advice. ~player.ifMale(He|She)~'s also visited my world a few times, so yes, we are acquaintances.
Indeed! People's faith in me gives me power, and I in turn protect them from danger and respond to some of their requests.
Yes, that's correct! There are no complicated rituals, but people putting their faith in me give me strength to protect them and to help them in other ways.

A crush? Er, um, n-no, it's not like that... But once when ~player~ was going to visit my dimension, the portal appeared too high up and ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ crashed into and almost crushed me... At least ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ wasn't hurt...

(Do I really stare at ~player.ifMale(him|her)~.too much?) ...Kyou, let's be serious. ~Player~ has helped me once or twice, but I'm not interested in love. I'm a goddess and all. You must have misunderstood it.
My most important duty is to fight monsters and robots to protect my citizens. In peaceful times, I do paperwork and respond to various requests. But I usually have time to pursue my hobbies, too.
Yes, Kyou, I'm an actual goddess, and I rule over a country called Lastation. If you ever visit the world of Gamindustri, you'll be able to see for yourself.
I was serious, Kyou. I'm an actual goddess, and I rule over Lastation, the most prosperous country in the world of Gamindustri. It might sound strange, but it's all true.
Really cool? Hehe~ Thank you! I'm a goddess, so I fight monsters and do various quests... But I rarely visit this dimension, so I'm glad I found here someone who appreciates Lastation's fashion.

I'm a goddess, so I oversee my country and protect my citizens from danger... I'm happy that you like these clothes, because I know little about fashion in this world. They don't look out of place here, right?
Is that another meaning of the word "goddess" in this world? I should keep it in mind when I talk about myself, then. But no, I never do things like that, Natsuki.
In this world, do goddesses model underwear? I wouldn't do it no matter how many shares I'd win.
Maybe. But I love this look too. Is there something wrong with it, Natsuki?
Even otaku are sometimes right. I love this style so much, I can't imagine myself with anything else. If I accidentally cater to some of my believers, it's like hitting two birds with one stone.
You can draw ~player~'s attention away from me anytime you want, Natsuki. I don't really care for it, or anything.

Indeed, Natsuki, it's embarrassing to be stared at by someone like ~player~! It's not like I'm doing anything to draw ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ attention. Distract ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ if you want.
Natsuki, don't lead ~player~ to such a misunderstanding... (I should be grateful to her if she helps ~player~ notice...)
Natsuki, what in the world are you talking about? (Is it really obvious to her? ~Player~ probably hasn't noticed even now.)
That's right, Ringo. You don't seem a novice to games either, and apparently you can use some magic too, so I'm hoping for an interesting battle.
I'm very famous in my world. I'm the goddess of one its nations. I've also performed as an idol. Could it be that some my performances have reached even the dimension where you live?

I'm not a scholar. I use magic, but I can't really explain how it works. I only know that I need shares to use my strongest powers. I hope you won't miss the magic of my thigh-highs, though, ~adrien~, because now I have to take them off.

Yes, Ringo, I'm from another dimension, from a world called Gamindustri. Histoire created a portal for me, using share energy, and she'll create another one when I want to return... But do you mean that you don't know how to go back home?

You seem to think about one thing only, ~mari_setogaya~! Just that I agreed to play strip poker with ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ means nothing! ...But since you have so much experience, I'll let you tell me, hypothetically, what place you recommend!

If you tried, you'd like my type of games too. Imagine that you have a picture of yourself, but there is a way to make your semblance in it move and take any actions you want. Lowee is the oldest country in Gamindustri, and it has the greatest population of the elderly. It produces a lot of video games targeted at a casual player, which are popular among children, too... Are you listening to me, ~aiopp~?

What are dogoos? Slimy creatures with some canine features: Part dog, part goo. Usually, they're cute and do almost no harm aside from shamelessly licking people, but they're able to merge to form larger and stronger ones. There are dogoos with slimy tentacles too, which are much more dangerous.

If goddesses such as Vert and me ruled Earth, it could become a very peaceful place. Don't you agree, ~player~? There are no creatures as powerful as dragons, phoenixes, or flying whales here, and machines and robots are so primitive that they present no danger either.

Each country in Gamindustri has its specialty foods, chosen by the goddesses. Maybe you've heard about Planeptune's pudding, Lowee's manjuu, Leanbox's mushrooms, and Lastation's curry. I cook fine curry myself... but don't imagine I'll ever cook for you, ~player~.

Where Vert gets her tea from? I doubt all the varieties she drinks are grown in Leanbox. Could it be she actually imports it from other worlds? Maybe even from Earth? Using transdimensional portals just to buy tea seems like a waste of share energy to me, but I know her well enough not to be surprised if it's true.

Neptune is pretty skilled with her katana, but her fighting style is wild and strength-based. I much prefer to watch Nepgear's moves, which are more dance-like and elegant. Maybe she learned that by observing me?

Apparently, Neptune stays slim despite eating so much pudding and snacks by transforming repeatedly into and out of her Hard Drive Divinity form. It does burn calories faster than normal workout, but is uses up a lot of share energy too. She's unbelievably irresponsible.

What are dogoos? Part dog, part goo, as the name implies. Mostly, they're cute and almost harmless apart from shamelessly licking people, but if there are many, they're able to merge and form a giant one. If you ever visit Gamindustri and stumble upon them, you better be careful, ~aiopp~. Especially around the tentacled ones.
I wonder if Unimites the demon king still has followers who sell his keyholders, posters and fashion accessories... Or was it Uminites...?
